headline: Abrams Helped Turn Georgia Blue. She Thinks It Can Stay That Way.
text: After years of close calls, red herrings, and electoral margins that grew closer and closer, Democrats won Georgia in this year’s presidential election for the first time since 1992.
snippet: Democrats agree that Ms. Abrams’s political vision helped deliver Georgia to Joe Biden. In an interview with The New York Times, she lays out why 2020 was the year it came together.
